articles.title: Samsung Unpacked: How to watch the Galaxy S25 event on Wednesday
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Samsung is unveiling its latest Galaxy S25 phones at its first Galaxy Unpacked event of 2025 on Wednesday, January 22. The event is expected to showcase a new lineup of Galaxy S25 phones, including Ultra, Plus, and regular models.

articles.title: How to watch Samsung's Galaxy S25 Unpacked event on January 22
articles.author: Bryan M. Wolfe
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22nd. The event will showcase the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Plus, and Galaxy S25 Ultra, with a potential fourth device called Galaxy S25 'Slim'. The new phones are expected to have thinner designs, a new Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and new AI features.

articles.title: TikTok、米国でサービス再開　トランプ氏が救済示唆
articles.author: Elizabeth Wollman
articles.summary: TikTok has started restoring service in the U.S. for its users after a ban, influenced by President-elect Donald Trump's indication to issue an executive order to reinstate the service. The company expresses gratitude to Trump and plans to collaborate on a long-term solution.

articles.title: Aldi launches £2 limited edition Burns Night treat – and Scots will love it
articles.author: Paige Beresford
articles.summary: Aldi Scotland, in collaboration with Punjab Pakora, has launched a limited-edition square sausage pakora for Burns Night. This new product, available in Aldi's 109 Scottish stores, combines Scottish sausage with pakora and includes a spicy tomato and chilli dip.

articles.title: Starbucks opens new store in Portugal
articles.summary: Starbucks is expanding in Portugal with a new store opening in Braga on January 21st. The store, located at Largo de São Francisco, has a capacity of 42 seats and marks Starbucks' 32nd store opening in the country. This reinforces Starbucks' commitment to expanding its presence in the national market.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Is Almost Here: What to Expect at Samsung Unpacked and How to Watch
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 series and updates to Galaxy AI at its Unpacked event on January 22nd. The Galaxy S25 lineup is expected to include the baseline S25, the S25 Plus, and the S25 Ultra, potentially featuring a more rounded design and Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 processors.

articles.title: Inside Newcastle's new pancake house as viral hit enjoys a flipping brilliant launch
articles.author: Barbara Hodgson
articles.summary: Fluffy Fluffy, a viral sensation known for its soufflé pancakes, has opened its 10th UK location in Newcastle. The café offers its signature pancakes, made with whipped egg whites and a variety of toppings, as well as savory 'croffles' and specialty drinks like matcha espresso and pistachio latte. The opening was celebrated with free drinks and half-price pancakes.

articles.title: Tried Lush's Bath Bot? My out-of-body experience that banished the January blues
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Lush launched its new product, the Bath Bot, on November 27, priced at £150 and available in the UK and Ireland on lush.com. This water-resistant dome-shaped device offers 180-degree sound and synchronized full-spectrum multidirectional lights to create a bespoke sensory bathing or shower experience via the Lush app, with Bluetooth connectivity to play music from sources like Spotify and YouTube.

articles.title: Samsung Bixby Revival: What to Expect from Galaxy Unpacked Event
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch an upgraded version of its virtual assistant, Bixby, at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. The new Bixby will leverage advancements in generative AI, including Samsung Gauss LLM and Google Gemini, to offer contextual understanding, predictive assistance, and seamless integration with Samsung's ecosystem, including IoT devices, Samsung Health, and SmartThings. The goal is to create a more personalized and efficient user experience by anticipating user needs and simplifying daily tasks.

articles.title: 39 Things That'll Fix All The Little Problems Around Your Home You've Been Putting Off
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Venalli Builds, a small business in Kansas, introduces hoodie hangers designed for easy hoodie storage, featuring a removable clip for various rod sizes. The Roll Keeper, a woman-owned small business, offers a T-shirt roll holder for space-saving clothing storage. Soto, another small business, provides multi-surface touch-up paint kits with a color-matching tool for seamless wall repairs.

articles.title: Amazon is ending ‘convenient' perk for Prime members, thanks to AI replacement
articles.author: Eleanor Tolbert
articles.summary: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' program, which allowed Prime members to order apparel items on a trial basis. This decision stems from the limited scaling of the program and the increasing use of AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations. The program, launched in 2018, will be phased out to simplify the customer experience, though customers will still get free returns for apparel.

articles.title: Older shoppers love this folding step stool for getting in and out of cars — it's down to $29
articles.author: Heather Quinlan
articles.summary: TreeLen Folding Step Stool is introduced as a solution for reaching high places and assisting with balance. Amazon is offering it for $29. Over 3,700 Amazon shoppers gave it a five-star review, citing its sturdiness and versatility.

articles.title: ⚡Over 90 New Products Launched in 1st Two Days of Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025
articles.summary: At the Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025, 22 brands launched 56 new products at Bharat Mandapam. An additional 5 launches occurred at Yashobhoomi, Dwarka. The total number of launches during the first two days of the expo exceeded 90.

articles.title: LOGO.com Launches New Logo Maker With Advanced AI-Powered Designs
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: LOGO.com has launched a new AI-powered logo maker designed to offer advanced customization and ease of use for businesses. The new logo maker allows complete control over logo design elements, shuffle color palette options, and AI image and text generation within the Design Hub, incorporating logos, brand colors, and fonts into over 1,200 design templates. The platform also provides optimized files for online and offline use.

articles.title: LOGO.com Launches New Logo Maker With Advanced AI-Powered Designs
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: LOGO.com launched a new logo maker featuring advanced AI-powered designs and customization improvements. The new logo maker enables businesses to generate unlimited logos and customize them with millions of elements, designs, fonts, and colors. It also includes AI image and text generation to the Design Hub allowing business owners to effortlessly create personalized designs.

articles.title: Get Up To 50% Off On Washing Machine: The Great Republic Day Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Whirlpool introduces the 6 Kg Royal Fully-Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine with ZPF technology and auto tub clean. LG presents the 7 Kg Fully-Automatic Front Load Washing Machine featuring Direct Drive technology and Steam Wash. Samsung offers the 7 kg Fully-Automatic Top Load Washing Machine with Centre Jet Pulsator and Diamond Drum. Godrej launches the 7 Kg Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine, combining Zero Pressure and Tidal Wash Technologies.

articles.title: Inauguration--What's The Scent of "Triumph"? Sensori.Ai Answers: It's Bigly--with Extra Musk
articles.author: sensori.ai
articles.summary: Sensori.Ai launched "Triumph", a unique fragrance based on the texts of President Trump's public remarks. The fragrance combines top notes of Green Grass and Spices, middle notes of Leather, Vetiver, Cypriol Oil, and Rose, with a base of Amber and Musk.

articles.title: If You're A New Parent And You're Terrified, I've Got You Covered With These 39 Product Suggestions
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article showcases new products and accessories designed to help parents with their babies. It includes reviews of items such as Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater Spray for removing stains, Baby Shusher for calming babies, FridaBaby's Baby Basics Kit with essential tools, and Hatch Rest Baby Sound Machine for sleep routines. Also it includes Baby Brezza Formula Pro Advanced for preparing formula, Bugaboo Butterfly stroller and many more.

articles.title: Would you let AI choose your outfits?
articles.author: Chloë Hamilton
articles.summary: The author experimented with the styling app 'Acloset' which uses AI to generate outfits from a digitized wardrobe. The app offers functions like outfit creation and generation based on factors like occasion, location, and weather.  The author found that using the app saved time and encouraged sartorial experimentation, eventually reigniting the author's personal style.

articles.title: Amazon thinks AI helping you buy clothes is better than you sending back whatever doesn't fit
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Amazon is replacing its 'Try Before You Buy' program with a new 'Virtual Try-On' feature at the end of January. This new feature utilizes AI tools to provide virtual clothing try-ons and size recommendations, aiming to improve the online shopping experience.

articles.title: The Best Powerful Blenders That Aren't Vitamix, According To Reviewers
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Ninja introduces a blender with a 72-ounce capacity and powerful blades for crushing ice and frozen ingredients. Hamilton Beach offers an affordable 40-ounce blender with 12 functions and a glass pitcher. Ninja also presents Ninja Foodi Smoothie Maker and Nutrient Extractor for smoothies, frozen smoothie bowls, pestos and nut butters.

articles.title: 'I love with my dehumidifier - it's a game-changer for banishing mould and now at a lower price'
articles.author: Samuel Jones
articles.summary: The Russell Hobbs 10L dehumidifier effectively eliminates moisture, prevents condensation, and aids in clothes drying, though it may be noisy. Customer reviews are mixed, with some praising its performance and design, while others found it ineffective. It is available for purchase on Amazon.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers spot Nando's £1.25 dupe that's ‘better than the original' back on shelves in store
articles.author: Louis Regan
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing dupe products including Bramwells peri-peri sauce and Crestwood Sausage Rolls, marketed as alternatives to Nando's sauces and Greggs sausage rolls. The sauces are priced at £1.25 each, and the sausage rolls come in a pack of four for £1.19.

articles.title: How to use web version of xAI's Grok AI chatbot
articles.summary: xAI has launched a web-based beta version of its Grok AI chatbot, accessible at Grok.com. The web app mirrors features of the iOS version, including real-time information gathering, question answering, and image generation. Users can access Grok via Google or email login in addition to X account.

articles.title: The 'perfect' £65 M&S dress which one shopper said is 'one of the best'
articles.author: Robson McCallister
articles.summary: M&S customers are highly satisfied with the Jersey Printed V-Neck Midi Tea Dress, priced at £65. Praised for its versatility, comfort, and flattering fit, the dress also features convenient pockets, making it suitable for various occasions. Despite overwhelmingly positive reviews, one customer noted that the pockets added bulk to the hip area.

articles.title: Top five hair masks in Israel of 2025
articles.author: ALIE M. TAUB
articles.summary: Argania offers Hyaluronic Acid and Keratin Hair Mask known for its natural ingredients. L'Oréal Paris launched Elvive Hyaluronic Care System Moisture Wrapping Mask as a lightweight hydrating product and Metal Detox Professional Mask for fast-acting hair repair. Garnier introduced Fructis Pineapple Hair Food Mask, noted for its appealing scent and gentle effect. La Beaute offers Elixir Vitamin Mask, which is recognized for its ability to significantly enhance hair shine.

articles.title: Are people too busy to wash? The first 'washing machine' for people is being created - here's when it's expected to hit the market
articles.author: Natural Pool
articles.summary: Science Co., a Japanese company, is launching 'Mirai Ningen Sentakuk,' an AI-powered human washing machine, at the Osaka Expo 2025. This device, inspired by a 1970s Sanyo Electric concept, offers a personalized bath-like experience and focuses on both physical cleaning and mental well-being. The company plans for mass production and a home edition after initial testing and is already taking reservations.

articles.title: 29 Snuggly Things For Anyone Feeling Extra Eepy This Winter
articles.summary: LuxClub specializes in soft, durable, luxury-style sheets available on Amazon. Cup Cozy Pillow offers family-friendly snack and drink organizers. Plufl, featured on Shark Tank, provides comfortable dog beds available in two colors on Amazon, enhancing pet comfort and care.

articles.title: Review: We test the latest Roomba Combo 10 Max robot vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: iRobot has released the Roomba Combo 10 Max, a new flagship robot vacuum. The Combo 10 Max includes a mop cleaning and drying system, strong suction capabilities, and integrates with the iRobot app. While similar to the Combo J9+, the Combo 10 Max features a more advanced base station and is considered a better value proposition.

articles.title: Review: We test the latest Roomba Combo 10 Max robot vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: iRobot has launched its new flagship Roomba Combo 10 Max, featuring a mop cleaning and drying system. The Combo 10 Max boasts excellent suction capabilities and effective floor coverage.  The iRobot app is user-friendly, and the mopping system cleans effectively despite the fixed mop pad.

articles.title: 'I paid £14 to do my laundry in a pub car park and it was a grim experience'
articles.author: James Holt
articles.summary: Wash Me UK, previously known as Revolution Laundry, offers self-service washing machines and dryers located outside supermarkets and in car parks, available 24/7 and accepting card payments. The firm has more than 750 machines across the UK and provide users a convenient alternative for laundry needs, especially in the winter months or when a traditional laundrette is not accessible.

articles.title: Instagram Influencer Turns Lubricant Into THIS Face Product; Internet Girlies Are Divided
articles.summary: An Instagram influencer demonstrated using lubricant as a makeup primer, suggesting it as a good makeup base for people with sensitive skin. Some brands, like Plush and Sanfe, market their lubricants as moisturizers, suitable for sensitive areas.

articles.title: Israel continues attacks on Gaza Strip over missing hostage list
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: AI-powered paraphrasing tools are designed to help users rewrite and refine text while keeping its original meaning intact. They enhance messages, making them clearer and ensuring they resonate with audiences, transforming writing into something more polished and professional. The tool generates multiple rewritten versions for users to choose from, improving writing, engaging audiences, and achieving content goals.

articles.title: 38 Things You Deserve To Own If You Don't Already
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: The article features multiple product recommendations. Among these is a mascara designed for adding serious length to lashes, a product designed to help eliminate wine sulfates and tannins, and a hair styling tool that blow dries and styles hair with three heat settings, an oval brush for volume, and a ceramic-coated barrel for heat protection.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9 series is £150 off in January sale that beats EE and O2
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Mobiles.co.uk is offering a £100 discount on the new Google Pixel 9, which features 128GB storage and AI features. Vodafone is providing a 400GB plan for £32 per month and reducing the upfront cost with the PIXEL100 code. Mobiles.co.uk is also offering a £50 discount on a budget-friendly option, while Sky Mobile reduced prices on a new product.

articles.title: 'My sofa took six months to arrive — so I built a £20m business'
articles.author: Rod Gilmour
articles.summary: Darlings of Chelsea invested £800,000 in augmented reality (AR) which meant customers could view sofas in their choice of fabric, style and colour from a 360-degree spin. The introduction of AR has made sofa shopping simpler, allowing customers to configure and view sofas in their own spaces using their phones.  The returns rate for Darlings of Chelsea dropped after they introduced AR to their service.

articles.title: What the Switch 2 reveals about Nintendo and where it is headed
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing to launch the Switch 2, an iteration of the original Switch. The Switch 2 features improved hardware, including a larger screen, new Joy-Cons and is designed to be backwards compatible with existing Switch games. The company aims to build upon the hybrid form factor, indicating a strategic move to solidify the Switch's position in the market.

articles.title: 내 손 안의 AI 얼마나 똑똑해질까…베일 벗을 갤럭시25 어떤 모습?
articles.author: Cbs노컷뉴스 조태임 기자
articles.summary: Samsung is hosting Galaxy Unpacked January 2025, an event focused on 'The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences.' This suggests the unveiling of new mobile products or services incorporating significant advancements in Artificial Intelligence.

articles.title: The nightmare of getting smartphone files onto a Windows PC is over
articles.summary: Microsoft's Phone Link allows Windows PC users to wirelessly connect with Android smartphones, enabling features like text message management, photo viewing, app usage, call handling, and notification management. Lenovo's Smart Connect facilitates similar close integration between Lenovo tablets/Motorola smartphones and Windows PCs.

articles.title: FTC: Pepsi hurt small businesses by giving big-box retailer advantages
articles.author: Auzinea Bacon
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching a brand new logo to celebrate its 125th anniversary. Shoppers will begin seeing the new packaging on store shelves this fall.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland selling ‘game-changer' for cleaning houses – it costs just €29.99 and comes with huge perks
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland introduced the 1500W Steam Mop & Handheld Steam Cleaner, a versatile cleaning tool priced at €29.99. Also launched are Vacuum Sealer Rolls for €4.99 to keep food fresh and Aromata Food & Freezer Bags that are heat and cold resistant for food storage. These items are available for a limited time, emphasizing affordability and innovation.

articles.title: New Look's gorgeous jumper shoppers say are 'so cosy'
articles.author: Jodie Bradley
articles.summary: New Look is showcasing two outfits featuring their jumpers: a baby pink fluffy teddy knit jumper on sale for £17.99 and a chocolate brown crew neck jumper on sale for £22.49. The company describes the pink jumper as cozy and texture-rich, while the brown jumper is highlighted for its oversized scale and layering potential.

articles.title: 9 Tips and Tricks to Get More out of Your Amazon Kindle
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: The Kindle Paperwhite Signature Edition and Kindle Colorsoft offer simple interfaces but include hidden features. Users can look up definitions, access Wikipedia entries, and translate words directly on the device.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch Part Deux – The TouchArcade Show #611
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the hardware for the 'Switch successor' in a video. This new product is scheduled to launch this year.

articles.title: These 44 Reliable Products Have Some Real 'I'm In My Thirties And Too Tired For Nonsense' Energy
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article features a variety of newly launched products available on Amazon, including I Dew Care's dry shampoo powder, La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, and L'Oréal Paris BB Cream. Other featured products include Bentgo stackable lunch container, Mindset's guided visual "breathing partner", Maple Holistics' sulfate-free biotin shampoo, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, and many more.

articles.title: Tough Grime Is No Match for This Electric Spin Scrubber That Makes Cleaning a ‘Breeze,' and It's 43% Off
articles.author: Nicol Natale
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Ykyi Electric Spin Scrubber at a discounted price. This cordless scrubber features multiple brush heads and speed settings for cleaning various surfaces. Customer reviews praise its effectiveness and time-saving capabilities.

articles.title: This robot vacuum has a clever new trick, but it won't stay new for long
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Roborock has introduced the Qrevo Edge, a robot vacuum featuring a retractable wheel that allows it to overcome room thresholds up to four centimeters high. The Qrevo Edge also includes an asymmetrical sweeping arm and extendable mop, along with simultaneous mopping and vacuuming capabilities. Dreame showcased at CES a similar model capable of overcoming six centimetre thresholds.

articles.title: What to expect from Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy S25 Ultra, AI features, and more
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil its Galaxy S25 lineup, including the Galaxy S25 Ultra, at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. The new lineup will feature new AI capabilities.

articles.title: The Lenovo Legion Go S is the true Steam Deck alternative we've all been waiting ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The user is anticipating the release of the Legion Go 2 and is considering the Legion Go S due to the uncertain release date of the former. This suggests Lenovo may be planning new versions or models of its Legion Go product line.

articles.title: Progresso launches limited edition soup-flavored hard candy: ‘Nasty as hell'
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Progresso, a General Mills company, launched 'Soup Drops,' chicken noodle-flavored hard candies, to celebrate National Soup Month. These candies are being sold through the end of January.
